name: ModifyWarehouseTable
description:
Update a specific warehouse table's information.

Use this tool to update details of a specific warehouse table within a given project environment in Datadog. Ideal for modifying existing warehouse table configurations.

parameters.name: warehouse_table_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the data warehouse table to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this data warehouse table.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: warehouse_table_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details to modify a warehouse table, including id, format, and other attributes.

format.description:
* `CSV` - CSV
* `CSVWithNames` - CSVWithNames
* `Parquet` - Parquet
* `JSONEachRow` - JSON
* `Delta` - Delta
* `DeltaS3Wrapper` - DeltaS3Wrapper

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this data warehouse table.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this data warehouse table.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
